settings.title: Darum ist Gefriertrocknung so gut
settings.subheading: Durch die Gefriertrocknung bleiben wichtige Nährstoffe und der köstliche Geschmack von Bioprodukten erhalten, während die Ernährung nachhaltig und haltbar ist.

settings.title: Preserves nutrients
settings.sub_headline: Vejo's organic fruit and vegetables are harvested at peak ripeness and immediately shock frozen. The freeze-drying process removes the water, but not the valuable nutrients and fiber.

settings.title: Maximizes freshness
settings.sub_headline: By removing the water, organic fruits and vegetables can be stored without refrigeration for at least 12 months. Grab your Vejo, add liquid & blend to unlock that delicious flavor.

settings.title: Reduces food waste
settings.sub_headline: Approximately 40% of food in the United States goes to waste. Freeze-drying in a biodegradable pod ensures less waste from packaging and a longer shelf life for fruits and veggies.

settings.title: A sustainable system
settings.sub_headline: Due to the lower volume and weight of the ingredients after freeze-drying, less packaging is required. This also allows us to transport more product using fewer emissions over time.

settings.main_subhead: Vejo Smoothie Blends are made with 100% freeze-dried organic fruit and veggies to preserve nutrients while prolonging shelf life & reducing food waste. The cherry on top - blends can be stored for at least 12 months without refrigeration. A conventional smoothie just can't compete with our portable pods!

settings.title: So how does freeze-drying work?
settings.subheading: Our fruits and veggies are harvested at peak ripeness and immediately frozen. Then through a process called lyophilization, we lower the temperature and decrease the air pressure surrounding the ingredients, turning the water into a vapor that's removed. We grind the remaining ingredients into a smooth powder that retains nearly all of the produce's compound nutrients, only to be rehydrated and restored upon blending with liquid.

settings.title: Vejo Blends haben immer Saison
settings.subheading: Du kannst dich immer auf echtes Obst und Gemüse verlassen, das in der Hochsaison geerntet und gefriergetrocknet wird, um Geschmack, Mikronährstoffe und Antioxidantien zu erhalten.
